title: Effect of Polygonatum sibiricum on biological toxicity of zinc oxide nanoparticles during respiratory exposure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31360-31366
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03738C, Paper

Jingjing Yao, Wanqing Yang, Liang Tang, Dicheng Yang, Yan Xu, Shenmin Zhu, Jun Zhu
ZnO-PS NPs are synthesized to reduce the pulmonary toxicity of inhaled ZnO NPs through attaching finer ZnO NPs and endowing them with the desirable antioxidant activity of the composites.
